title: Mods for Maps and HUD like Dota (Im sorry for comparing hear me out first)

embed.description: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ZuSlHveHTt0 ~Stay a while and listen!~ New textures for Summoners rift. Loading art Summoners rift as a make shift execution ground, Signs of neglect can be seen throughout the area as it slowly decays. Twisted remains of bodies, Dead leafs from the seasonal changes as it closes in to the harrowing, Do you dare to...

body:
I was surfing the web and looking at some League Art (Love the art of league its so brilliant) 

And i saw this photo clicked on the link and i saw this and i thought why doesn't league support skin mods such as these if not even Sell them?

Like i never mods, but i was really curious as to if it is even possible! 

I personally think if we could change the way the Rift Looks (NOT PERMA) but through controlled mods by Riot i recon it would make the game alot more fun and artistic (YES LIKE DOTA)

Thoughts? If it is also possible to get a Riot Employees perspective

PS try this link more variety https://mapskins.com/maps/SR-skins/
